channel.title: Java error... lol
channel.description:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable programs or batch file. press any key to continue...
well taht what client says i can run on windows xp on my old labtop with out ne problems, but i keep getting this error i set a path and everything... anyone have any ideas or what

item.title: Java error... lol
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“d3r3k017, post:7, topic:237157”]jdk-6u10[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2008, 04:24:40 pm[/size][hr]thanks for help i found the right path code %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin; sorry for wasting your time +1 rep for you[/quote]You can’t rep, you’re only 10 rep and you need 15. Also, that’s for jre and not jdk so it wouldn’t work to compile.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

Removed the profanity towards vista in the topic. Vista is a great operating system, the people who use it aren’t and blame everything that goes wrong on the os. It works on xp because you set your paths, on vista you have to set your paths the same way.
